name: Basecamp Project Management - Login, To-Do List Creation, and Task Management Flow
description: Verify user login, project navigation, to-do list creation, task addition with comments, and due date assignment
steps: Navigate to https://basecamp.com/
Click the 'Sign in' link with href 'https://launchpad.37signals.com/signin'
In the email/username input field with placeholder 'Email or username', enter 'inbaperson@gmail.com'
In the password input field with label 'Password', enter 'K7#mP9$vL2@xQ8!'
Click the 'Next' submit button to authenticate
Verify successful login by checking for user dashboard or project list page
Click on the project link or card titled 'My project'
Navigate to the 'To-dos' section by clicking the To-dos navigation link or tab
Click the 'New list' button to create a new to-do list
In the text input field with placeholder 'Name the list...', enter 'QA automation'
Click the 'Add this list' button to create the new to-do list
Verify the new list 'QA automation' appears in the to-do lists view
In the text input field with placeholder 'Describe this to-do', enter 'This is a todo for QA automation'
Click the 'Add this to-do' button to create the task
Verify the to-do item appears in the list with text 'This is a todo for QA automation'
Click on the to-do listing item to open the task detail view
Verify the task detail page loads with full task title displayed as heading
Locate the comment input field with placeholder 'Add a comment...'
In the comment text area, enter 'sample comment for QA'
Click the 'Add this comment' button to post the comment
Verify the comment appears with text 'sample comment for QA'
Click the 'Select a date' link or button next to the 'Due on' label
In the date picker, click on the date '31' to select January 31, 2026
Click the 'Save changes' button to set the due date
Verify the due date 'Sat, Jan 31' appears in the 'Due on' section of the task detail page
